title: Conflict between Judaism and Christianity - Collection 3
description:
Conflict between Judaism and Christianity - Collection 3:

We have 32 titles here:

-  Abulafia (Ed.) - Religious Violence between Christians and Jews; Medieval Roots, Modern Perspectives (2002)

-  Attias - The Jews and the Bible (2015)

-  Becker & Reed (Eds.) - The Ways That Never Parted; Jews and Christians in Late Antiquity and the Early Middle Ages (2007)

-  Bellis & Kaminsky (Eds.) - Jews, Christians, and the Theology of the Hebrew Scriptures (2000)

-  Binder - Tertullian, On Idolatry and Mishnah Avodah Zarah; Questioning the Parting of the Ways between Christians and Jews (2012)

-  Chazan - Fashioning Jewish Identity in Medieval Western Christendom (2004)

-  Connelly - From Enemy to Brother; the Revolution in Catholic Teaching on the Jews, 1933-1965 (2012)

-  Dunn (Ed.) - Jews and Christians; the Parting of the Ways, A.D. 70 to 135 (1992)

-  Elukin - Living Together, Living Apart; Rethinking Jewish-Christian Relations in the Middle Ages (2007)

-  Frassetto (Ed.) - Christian Attitudes toward the Jews in the Middle Ages, A Casebook (2007)

-  Fredriksen - Augustine and the Jews; a Christian Defense of Jews and Judaism (2008)

-  Gambetti - The Alexandrian Riots of 38 C.E. and the Persecution of the Jews; a Historical Reconstruction (2009)

-  Gillingham (Ed.) - Jewish & Christian Approaches to the Psalms; Conflict & Convergence (2013)

-  Haynes - Jews and the Christian Imagination; Reluctant Witnesses (1995)

-  Horbury - Jews and Christians in Contact and Controversy (1998)

-  Jossa - Jews or Christians; the Followers of Jesus in Search of Their Own Destiny (2006)

-  Kertzer - The Popes Against the Jews; The Vatican's Role in the Rise of the Modern Anti-Semitism (2001)

-  Kessler & Wenborn (Eds.) - A Dictionary of Jewish-Christian Relations (2005)


-  Klein -  Jews, Christian Society and Royal Power in Medieval Barcelona (2006)

-  Lipton - Dark Mirror; the Medieval Origins of Anti-Jewish Iconography (2014)

-  Lucass - The Concept of the Messiah in the Scriptures of Judaism and Christianity (2011)

-  Manuel - The Broken Staff; Judaism through Christian Eyes (1992)

-  McMichael & Myers (Eds.) - Friars and Jews in the Middle Ages and Renaissance (2004)

-  Meech - Paul in Israel's Story; Self and Community at the Cross (2006)

-  Mundill - England's Jewish Solution; Experiment and Expulsion, 1262-1290 (1998)

-  Page - Imperfect Sympathies; Jews and Judaism in British Romantic Literature and Culture (2004)

-  Popkin & Weiner (Eds.) - Jewish Christians and Christian Jews; from the Renaissance to the Enlightenment (1994)

-  Sigal - Isaiah 53; Who Is the Servant (2007)

-  Sigal - The Jew and the Christian Missionary; a Jewish Response to Missionary Christianity (1981)

-  Sorley - Jewish Christians and Judaism; a Study in the History of the First Two Centuries (1881)

-  Taylor - Anti-Judaism and Early Christian Identity; a Critique of the Scholarly Consensus (1995)

-  Trachtenberg - The Devil and the Jews; the Medieval Conception of the Jew and Its Relation to Modern Anti-Semitism (1943, 2001)
